content.name: Cine Quiz
content.description: Are you a Kollywood freak? Then this event is for you where we will be shooting questions on movies and songs.
rules: Round 1 - A Paper pen quiz where participants scoring the stipulated points for the given questions will proceed to Round 2.
Round 2-  Participants shall recognize the songs through beats and rhythms. The eligible teams will proceed to round 3.
Round 3- Finale round where the team should recognize the movie through pictures & plots. The team acquiring the maximum points will be rewarded.
